page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: The general editors and computer programmers were David.A.Harrison and Peter.M.Moriarty of 3.1,and to a lesser extent Phillip Dowland of 3.1 .Without their tireless efforts and boundless enthusiasm the task would have been impossible. Contributors whose work is included. A.Clayton,P.Dowland,D.Fisk,D.Harrison, S.Quinn,P.Moriarty,M.Rudd,L.Gilby,M.Ha ll,L.Redshaw,N.Madely,C.Carling,A.Burd ass,R.Brown,I.Lawson,R.Hunter,R.Peacoc k,W.Lamb. MR.D.Stevens provided the photographs, taken by his Drama-Film group. Land cover survey and amenities count:- A total of 80 pupils participated in the collection of this data.
